title: Moldova
summary: Moldova (/mɒlˈdoʊvə/ (listen), sometimes UK: /ˈmɒldəvə/; Romanian pronunciation: [molˈdova]),[14][15][16] officially the Republic of Moldova (Romanian: Republica Moldova), is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe.[17] It is bordered by Romania to the west and Ukraine to the north, east, and south.[18] Additionally, the unrecognised state of Transnistria lies across the Dniester on the country's eastern border with Ukraine. The capital and largest city is Chișinău.
